mapper.select: select id, office_id, hazard_factors_text, inspect_type, hazard_factors, type, status, content, order_num, del_flag, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time, delete_id, delete_time, work_state_code, work_state_text from t_office_term where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_office_term(office_id, hazard_factors_text, inspect_type, hazard_factors, type, status, content, order_num, del_flag, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time, delete_id, delete_time, work_state_code, work_state_text) values (#{officeId}, #{hazardFactorsText}, #{inspectType}, #{hazardFactors}, #{type}, #{status}, #{content}, #{orderNum}, #{delFlag}, #{createId}, #{createTime}, #{updateId}, #{updateTime}, #{deleteId}, #{deleteTime}, #{workStateCode}, #{workStateText})

insert into t_office_term(office_id, hazard_factors_text, inspect_type, hazard_factors, type, status, content, order_num, del_flag, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time, delete_id, delete_time, work_state_code, work_state_text) values
(#{entity.officeId}, #{entity.hazardFactorsText}, #{entity.inspectType}, #{entity.hazardFactors}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.content}, #{entity.orderNum}, #{entity.delFlag}, #{entity.createId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateId}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.deleteId}, #{entity.deleteTime}, #{entity.workStateCode}, #{entity.workStateText})

insert into t_office_term(office_id, hazard_factors_text, inspect_type, hazard_factors, type, status, content, order_num, del_flag, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time, delete_id, delete_time, work_state_code, work_state_text) values
(#{entity.officeId}, #{entity.hazardFactorsText}, #{entity.inspectType}, #{entity.hazardFactors}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.content}, #{entity.orderNum}, #{entity.delFlag}, #{entity.createId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateId}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.deleteId}, #{entity.deleteTime}, #{entity.workStateCode}, #{entity.workStateText})
on duplicate key update office_id = values(office_id), hazard_factors_text = values(hazard_factors_text), inspect_type = values(inspect_type), hazard_factors = values(hazard_factors), type = values(type), status = values(status), content = values(content), order_num = values(order_num), del_flag = values(del_flag), create_id = values(create_id), create_time = values(create_time), update_id = values(update_id), update_time = values(update_time), delete_id = values(delete_id), delete_time = values(delete_time), work_state_code = values(work_state_code), work_state_text = values(work_state_text)
mapper.update:
update t_office_term
office_id = #{officeId},
hazard_factors_text = #{hazardFactorsText},
inspect_type = #{inspectType},
hazard_factors = #{hazardFactors},
type = #{type},
status = #{status},
content = #{content},
order_num = #{orderNum},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
create_id = #{createId},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_id = #{updateId},
update_time = #{updateTime},
delete_id = #{deleteId},
delete_time = #{deleteTime},
work_state_code = #{workStateCode},
work_state_text = #{workStateText},
where id = #{id}
